titleStmt.title: More brave and good newes from Ireland being a trve relation of the victorious battell fought by Collonel Lesly, and four regiments of English against 7000 of the rebels neer to the City of Cork, Mar. 2, wherein the Earl of MacKair, and a Spanish Collonel were taken prisoners ... also another famous battell fought by Col. Douglass ... against the L. Deloms regiments, neer ... Yoghall, Mar. 1 ... with a relation how a Spanish ship was taken by a Bristoll ship, being bound for Ireland ...

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Huntington Library.
